Course Description: STUDENTS WILL LEARN THE BASIC OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING.  THEY WILL GAIN AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE PURPOSE AND USES OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING , INCLUDING REAL APPLICATIONS.  THIS COURSE WILL PROVIDE A BASIC FOR ADVANCED ACCOUNTING COURSES TO FOLLOW. THE COURSE WILL ALSO BE USED AS A MEANS OF PREPARING THE STUDENT FOR SUCCESSFUL CAREER IN BUSINESS BY DEVELOPING SKILLS OF ORGANIZATION, TIME MANAGEMENT, SELF DISCIPLINE, AND COMMUNICATIONS
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
